      • setDomainParameter

        public void setDomainParameter(byte[] param)
        Set the following domain parameter:
        • Prime modulus
        • First coefficient a
        • Second coefficient b
        • Base point G
        • Order of the base point
        • Cofactor f
        Other domain parameter will be ignored
        Parameters:
        param - The domain parameter TLV encoded

      • getDomainParameter

        public byte[] getDomainParameter()
        Returns:
        The domain parameter

      • wrapSignature

        public static byte[] wrapSignature(byte[] signature)
        Wrap an ECDSA signature in the format r || s into a TLV encoding as defined by RFC 3279
        Parameters:
        signature - containing the concatenation of r and s as unsigned integer values
        Returns:
        ASN.1 SEQUENCE objects containing two signed integer r and s
        Throws:
        TLVEncodingException

      • unwrapSignature

        public static byte[] unwrapSignature(byte[] signature,
                                     int keyLength)
                              throws TLVEncodingException
        Unwrap a ECDSA signature from the TLV encoding according to RFC3279 into the concatenation of the unsigned integer r and s
        Parameters:
        signature - TLV encoded signature
        keyLength -
        Returns:
        concatenation of r and s
        Throws:
        TLVEncodingException
